trans-unit.source: Provides connection management for HTTP connections.
trans-unit.target: Gir Tilkoblingsbehandling for HTTP-tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: The ServicePoint class handles connections to an Internet resource based on the host information passed in the resource's Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: Klassen ServicePoint behandler tilkoblinger til en Internett-ressursen som er basert på verten informasjonen som ble sendt i ressursen URI Uniform Resource Identifier ().

trans-unit.source: The initial connection to the resource determines the information that the ServicePoint object maintains, which is then shared by all subsequent requests to that resource.
trans-unit.target: Den første tilkoblingen til ressursen bestemmer informasjonen ServicePoint objektet opprettholder, som deretter er felles for alle etterfølgende forespørsler til denne ressursen.

trans-unit.source: ServicePoint objects are managed by the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager> class and are created, if necessary, by the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: ServicePoint objekter som administreres av den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager>klasse og er opprettet, hvis nødvendig ved den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager>

trans-unit.source: ServicePoint objects are never created directly but are always created and managed by the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager> class.
trans-unit.target: ServicePoint objekter aldri opprettet direkte, men alltid opprettes og administreres av <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager>klasse.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of ServicePoint objects that can be created is set by the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall ServicePoint objekter som kan opprettes er angitt av den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Each ServicePoint object maintains its connection to an Internet resource until it has been idle longer than the time specified in the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hver ServicePoint objekt beholder tilkoblingen til en Internett-ressursen før den har vært inaktiv lenger enn tiden som er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a ServicePoint exceeds the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> value, it can be recycled to another connection.
trans-unit.target: Når en ServicePoint overskrider den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>verdi, kan det resirkuleres til en annen tilkobling.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> is set by the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>er angitt av den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLeaseTimeout%2A> property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active ServicePoint connection is closed after it services the next request.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLeaseTimeout%2A>egenskapen er satt til en annen verdi enn -1, og når den angitte tiden utløper, en aktiv ServicePoint-tilkobling er lukket når den services neste forespørsel.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLeaseTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for applications that do not require active connections that are opened indefinitely, as they are by default.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for programmer som ikke krever aktive tilkoblinger som er åpnet i det uendelige, som de er som standard.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In high load conditions, some applications may run out of free threads in the ThreadPool, which may lead to poor system performance (such as high and variable transaction times).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I overbelastet betingelser noen programmer kan kjøres utenfor tråder i arbeidstråd, som kan føre til dårlig systemytelse (for eksempel høyt og variable transaksjonen ganger).

trans-unit.source: See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp) for a number of configuration changes you can make to fix this issue.
trans-unit.target: Se [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/dnpag/html/scalenetchapt17.asp) for en rekke konfigurasjonsendringer du kan gjøre for å løse dette problemet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the server that this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object connects to.
trans-unit.target: Henter Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for serveren som dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet som kobles til.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Uri> class that contains the URI of the Internet server that this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object connects to.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref:System.Uri>klassen som inneholder URIEN for Internet server som denne <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet som kobles til.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> is in host mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> er i modus for vert.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the delegate to associate a local <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> with a <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir representanten å knytte en lokal <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>med en <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: Some load balancing techniques require a client to use a specific local IP address and port number, rather than <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=fullName> (or <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6Any?displayProperty=fullName> for Internet Protocol Version 6) and an ephemeral port.
trans-unit.target: Noen load belastningsfordeling teknikker krever en klient å bruke et bestemt lokale IP-adresse og port. tall, snarere enn <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=fullName>(eller <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6Any?displayProperty=fullName>for Internet Protocol Version 6) og en midlertidig port.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress.IPv6Any?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Your BindIPEndPointDelegate can satisfy this requirement.
trans-unit.target: Den nye BindIPEndPointDelegate overholder dette kravet.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that forces a <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> to use a particular local Internet Protocol (IP) address and port number.
trans-unit.target: Representant som tvinger en <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> å bruke et bestemt lokale Internet Protocol IP-adresse og port. tall.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the certificate received for this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter sertifikatet mottatt for denne <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Although a <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object can make multiple connections to an Internet resource, it can maintain only one certificate.
trans-unit.target: Selv om en <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekt kan flere tilkoblinger til en Internett-ressurs, den kan ha bare ett sertifikat.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> class that contains the security certificate received for this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> klassen som inneholder sikkerhetssertifikatet som er mottatt for dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last client certificate sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter det siste klientsertifikatet som er sendt til serveren.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> object that contains the public values of the last client certificate sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> objektet som inneholder verdier som er felles for siste klientsertifikatet sendt til serveren.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified connection group from this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den angitte tilkobling-gruppen fra dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen grupper knytte et sett med forespørsler med en bestemt tilkobling eller et sett med tilkoblingene.

trans-unit.source: This method removes and closes all connections that belong to the specified connection group.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fjerner og lukker alle tilkoblinger som hører til den angitte tilkobling-gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the connection group that contains the connections to close and remove from this service point.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på tilkoblingsgruppe som inneholder koblinger for å lukke fra denne tjenestepunktet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the connection group was closed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om gruppen tilkoblingen ble lukket.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds after which an active <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall millisekunder som en aktiv <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that a <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object's active connections do not remain open indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å sikre at en <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektets aktive tilkoblinger ikke være åpen på ubestemt tid.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: This property is intended for scenarios where connections should be dropped and reestablished periodically, such as load balancing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er ment for scenarioer der tilkoblinger må slettes og gjenopprettet regelmessig, for eksempel belastningsfordeling scenarier.

trans-unit.source: By default, when <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> is `true` for a request, the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> property sets the time-out for closing <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> connections due to inactivity.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>er `true` for en forespørsel i <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>egenskapen angir tidsavbruddet for avsluttende <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>tilkoblinger på grunn av inaktivitet.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> has active connections, <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> has no effect and the connections remain open indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>har aktive tilkoblinger <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>har ingen virkning og tilkoblinger være åpen på ubestemt tid.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: When the ConnectionLeaseTimeout property is set to a value other than -1, and after the specified time elapses, an active <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> connection is closed after servicing a request by setting <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> to `false` in that request.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen ConnectionLeaseTimeout er satt til en annen verdi enn-1, og etter den angitte tiden går, en aktiv <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>tilkoblingen er lukket etter Vedlikehold en forespørsel ved å angi <xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A>til `false` i denne forespørselen.</xref:System.Net.FtpWebRequest.KeepAlive%2A> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: Setting this value affects all connections managed by the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne verdien settes påvirker alle tilkoblinger som administreres av den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektet.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that specifies the number of milliseconds that an active <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> connection remains open.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som angir antall millisekunder som en aktiv <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> tilkoblingen er åpen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which allows an active <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> connection to stay connected indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er -1, som tillater at en aktiv <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> tilkobling til forbli tilkoblet på ubestemt tid.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to 0 to force <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> connections to close after servicing a request.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen til 0 for å fremtvinge <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> tilkoblinger til lukke etter Vedlikehold en forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is a negative number less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for en set-operasjon er et negativt tall som er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections allowed on this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall tilkoblinger som tillates i denne <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionLimit property sets the maximum number of connections that the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object can make to an Internet resource.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ConnectionLimit angir maksimalt antall tilkoblinger i <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekt kan gjøre en Internett-ressurs.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ConnectionLimit property is set to the value of the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object is created; subsequent changes to <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit%2A> have no effect on existing <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen ConnectionLimit er satt til verdien for den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen når den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekt opprettes; etterfølgende endringer i <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit%2A>har ingen innvirkning på eksisterende <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekter.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit%2A> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of connections allowed on this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall tilkoblinger som tillates i denne <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The connection limit is equal to or less than 0.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsgrensen er lik eller mindre enn 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection name.
trans-unit.target: Henter tilkoblingsnavnet.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object was constructed with a <xref:System.Uri> object (the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A> or <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A> methods, for example), then the ConnectionName property represents the <xref:System.Uri.Scheme%2A> property of the <xref:System.Uri> object used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektet ble konstruert med en <xref:System.Uri>objektet (den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A>metoder, for eksempel), deretter egenskapen ConnectionName representerer den <xref:System.Uri.Scheme%2A>for den <xref:System.Uri>objektet som ble brukt.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Uri.Scheme%2A> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.FindServicePoint%2A> </xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object was constructed from a network host and port, the ConnectionName property contains a string that represents the host and the network port.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektet ble konstruert fra en nettverksvert og port, egenskapen ConnectionName inneholder en streng som representerer verten og nettverket port.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: If the ConnectionName property is set when constructed from a host and port, only <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> objects with the same <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A> value can use this <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ConnectionName angis når konstruert fra en vert og port, bare <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>objekter med samme <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A>verdi kan bruke dette <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektet.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest.ConnectionGroupName%2A> </xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the connection name.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer tilkoblingsnavnet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of open connections associated with this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall åpne tilkoblinger som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentConnections property contains the number of open Internet connections associated with this <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CurrentConnections inneholder antall åpne Internett-tilkoblinger som er knyttet til dette <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektet.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: The value of CurrentConnections cannot exceed that of <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for CurrentConnections kan ikke overskride som <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit%2A>.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.ConnectionLimit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of open connections associated with this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Antall åpne tilkoblinger som er knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that determines whether 100-Continue behavior is used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som bestemmer om 100-fortsette virkemåte brukes.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, client requests that use the `POST` method expect to receive a 100-Continue response from the server to indicate that the client should send the data to be posted.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, klient-forespørsler som bruker den `POST` metoden forventer en 100-fortsette svar fra serveren for å angi at klienten skal sende data til posteres.

trans-unit.source: This mechanism allows clients to avoid sending large amounts of data over the network when the server, based on the request headers, intends to reject the request.
trans-unit.target: Denne mekanisme gir klienter unngå å sende store mengder data på nettverket når serveren, basert på forespørselshodene, kommer til å avslå forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: For example, assume the Expect100Continue property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Anta for eksempel egenskapen Expect100Continue `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the request is sent to the server, it includes the data.
trans-unit.target: Når forespørselen er sendt til serveren, inkluderer dataene.

trans-unit.source: If, after reading the request headers, the server requires authentication and sends a 401 response, the client must resend the data with proper authentication headers.
trans-unit.target: Hvis serveren krever godkjenning etter at forespørselshodene, og sender svar 401, må klienten Send data med riktig autentisering-headere.

trans-unit.source: If the Expect100Continue property is `true`, the request headers are sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen Expect100Continue er `true`, forespørselshodene er sendt til serveren.

trans-unit.source: If the server has not rejected the request, it sends a 100-Continue response signaling that the data can be transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis serveren ikke har avslo forespørselen, sendes en 100-fortsette svar signaliserer at dataene kan overføres.

trans-unit.source: If, as in the preceding example, the server requires authentication, it sends the 401 response and the client has not unnecessarily transmitted the data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis serveren krever godkjenning som i det forrige eksemplet, sendes 401 svar, og klienten har ikke sendt dataene uten grunn.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for denne egenskapen påvirker ikke eksisterende tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: Only new connections created after the change are affected.
trans-unit.target: Bare påvirker nye tilkoblinger som er opprettet etter at endringen.

trans-unit.source: The Expect 100-Continue behavior is fully described in IETF RFC 2616 Section 10.1.1.
trans-unit.target: Expect 100-fortsette virkemåte fullstendig er beskrevet i IETF RFC 2616 10.1.1.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to expect 100-Continue responses for <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""></xref> requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>forventer 100-fortsette svar på <xref uid="langword_csharp_POST" name="POST" href=""> </xref> forespørsler; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object was last connected to a host.
trans-unit.target: Henter datoen og klokkeslettet som den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet sist ble koblet til en vert.

trans-unit.source: The IdleSince property records the last date and time at which a service point was disconnected from a host.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IdleSince registrerer den siste datoen og klokkeslettet service point ble koblet fra en vert.

trans-unit.source: When the difference between the current time and IdleSince exceeds the value of <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>, the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object is available for recycling to another connection.
trans-unit.target: Når forskjellen mellom gjeldende klokkeslett og IdleSince overstiger verdien for <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekt er tilgjengelig for resirkulering til en annen tilkobling.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.ServicePoint.MaxIdleTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time at which the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object was last connected.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>objekt som inneholder datoen og klokkeslettet da den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet ble sist tilkoblet.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a connection associated with the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object can remain idle before the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor lang tid en tilkobling tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objekt kan være inaktiv før tilkoblingen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: You can set MaxIdleTime to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName> to indicate that a connection associated with the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object should never time out.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi MaxIdleTime til <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName>til å angi en tilkobling tilknyttet den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objektet skal aldri tidsavbrudd.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the MaxIdleTime property is the value of the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when the <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for egenskapen MaxIdleTime er verdien for den <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen når den <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekt er opprettet.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent changes to the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A> property have no effect on existing <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende endringer i <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A>egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på eksisterende <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>objekter.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> </xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.MaxServicePointIdleTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the MaxIdleTime for a connection associated with a <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint> is exceeded, the connection remains open until the application tries to use the connection.
trans-unit.target: Når MaxIdleTime for en tilkobling som er tilknyttet en <xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>er overskredet, tilkoblingen er åpen før programmet prøver å bruke tilkoblingen.</xref:System.Net.ServicePoint>

trans-unit.source: At that time, the Framework closes the connection and creates a new connection to the remote host.
trans-unit.target: Da rammeverket lukker tilkoblingen og oppretter en ny tilkobling til ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in milliseconds, that a connection associated with the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object can remain idle before it is closed and reused for another connection.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid i millisekunder som en tilkobling tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objekt kan være inaktiv før den er lukket og brukes til en annen tilkobling på nytt.

trans-unit.source: MaxIdleTime is set to less than <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName> or greater than <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: MaxIdleTime settes til mindre enn <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite?displayProperty=fullName> eller større enn <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the HTTP protocol that the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object uses.
trans-unit.target: Henter versjonen av HTTP-protokollen som den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objekt bruker.

trans-unit.source: The HTTP protocol versions are HTTP/1.0 and HTTP/1.1.
trans-unit.target: HTTP-protokollen versjoner er HTTP/1.0 og HTTP/1.1.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> object that contains the HTTP protocol version that the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object uses.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Version>objekt som inneholder HTTP-protokollversjonen som den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objekt bruker.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the receiving buffer for the socket used by this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen på mottak bufferen for socket brukes av dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveBufferSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> that contains the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder størrelsen, i byte for mottaksbufferen.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default is 8192.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er 8192.

trans-unit.source: The value specified for a set operation is greater than <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for en set-operasjon er større enn <xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the keep-alive option on a TCP connection.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer eller deaktiverer Behold aktiv-alternativet i en TCP-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: An application can request that a TCP/IP provider enable the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan be om en TCP/IP-leverandør kunne bruke Behold aktiv-pakker på en TCP-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The default is that the use of keep-alive packets on a TCP connection is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er at bruken av Behold aktiv-pakker på en TCP-tilkobling er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: The default settings when a TCP socket is initialized sets the keep-alive timeout to 2 hours and the keep-alive interval to 1 second.
trans-unit.target: Standardinnstillingene når en TCP-socket er initialisert i Behold aktiv angir tidsavbruddet 2 timer, og behold aktiv-intervallet til ett sekund.

trans-unit.source: The `keepAliveTime` parameter specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
trans-unit.target: Den `keepAliveTime` parameteren angir hvor lang tid i millisekunder uten aktivitet før sendes første Behold aktiv-pakken.

trans-unit.source: The `keepAliveInterval` parameter specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
trans-unit.target: Den `keepAliveInterval` parameteren angir intervallet millisekunder mellom når etterfølgende Behold aktiv-pakker sendes hvis ingen bekreftelse er mottatt.

trans-unit.source: The number of keep-alive probes cannot be changed and is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: Antall Behold aktiv-sonder kan ikke endres og er satt til 10.

trans-unit.source: If a TCP connection is dropped as the result of keep-alives, a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> is returned to any calls in progress on the socket, and any subsequent calls will fail with a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en TCP-tilkoblingen blir brutt som et resultat av oppkoblinger, en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>returneres til alle samtaler pågår på socketen, og alle etterfølgende kall mislykkes med en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>

trans-unit.source: If set to true, then the TCP keep-alive option on a TCP connection will be enabled using the specified `keepAliveTime` and `keepAliveInterval` values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til SANN, deretter TCP Behold aktiv-alternativet i en TCP-tilkobling aktiveres ved hjelp av den angitte `keepAliveTime` og `keepAliveInterval` verdier.

trans-unit.source: If set to false, then the TCP keep-alive option is disabled and the remaining parameters are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til false, deretter TCP Behold aktiv-alternativet er deaktivert og gjenværende parametere blir ignorert.

trans-unit.source: The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er false.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the timeout, in milliseconds, with no activity until the first keep-alive packet is sent.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvor lang tid i millisekunder uten aktivitet før sendes første Behold aktiv-pakken.

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien må være større enn 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi mindre enn eller lik null er sendt en <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the interval, in milliseconds, between when successive keep-alive packets are sent if no acknowledgement is received.
trans-unit.target: Angir intervallet millisekunder mellom når etterfølgende Behold aktiv-pakker sendes hvis ingen bekreftelse er mottatt.

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: Verdien må være større enn 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of less than or equal to zero is passed an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi mindre enn eller lik null er sendt en <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>

trans-unit.source: The value specified for keepAliveTime or keepAliveInterval parameter is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien for keepAliveTime eller keepAliveInterval parameteren er mindre enn eller lik 0.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object supports pipelined connections.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet støtter pipelined tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: Pipelining allows clients to send multiple requests across a persistent connection without waiting for each response from the server.
trans-unit.target: Av tillater at klienter til å sende flere forespørsler over en fast tilkobling uten å vente på hver svar fra serveren.

trans-unit.source: The server sends the responses in the same order as the requests were received.
trans-unit.target: Serveren sender svarene i samme rekkefølge som forespørslene ble mottatt.

trans-unit.source: Pipelining is described in detail in IETF RFC 2616 section 8.1.2.2.
trans-unit.target: Av beskrives i detalj i IETF RFC 2616 delen 8.1.2.2.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object supports pipelined connections; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet støtter pipelined tilkoblinger; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that determines whether the Nagle algorithm is used on connections managed by this <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som bestemmer om algoritmen Nagle brukes på tilkoblinger som administreres av dette <xref href="System.Net.ServicePoint"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The Nagle algorithm is used to buffer small packets of data and transmit them as a single packet.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen Nagle brukes til å buffer lavt pakker med data og overføre dem som en enkelt pakke.

trans-unit.source: This process, referred to as "nagling," is widely used because it reduces the number of packets transmitted and lowers the overhead per packet.
trans-unit.target: Denne prosessen kalles "nagling" utbredt særlig fordi det reduserer antall pakker overføres og senker overhead per pakke.

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property does not affect existing connections.
trans-unit.target: Endre verdien for denne egenskapen påvirker ikke eksisterende tilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: Only new connections created after the change are affected.
trans-unit.target: Bare påvirker nye tilkoblinger som er opprettet etter at endringen.

trans-unit.source: The Nagle algorithm is fully described in IETF RFC 896.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmen Nagle er fullstendig beskrevet i IETF RFC 896.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the Nagle algorithm; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Bruke algoritmen Nagle; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
